definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: gasp, pant, pant after, long for (so Targum Job 7:2);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְשָׁאַף]] consec. Job 5:5, 3 fs. [[שָֽׁאֲפָה]] Je 2:24, 3 pl. [[שָֽׁאֲפוּ]] Je 14:6; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשְׁאַף]] Job 7:2, etc.; Pt. act. [[שׁוֹאֵף]] Ec 1:5;—

gasp, as a woman in travail, fig. of ´[[י]]:, Is 42:14 (‖[[נׇשַׁם ]]); pant after, snuff up the wind (acc.), of wild ass Je 2:24, Je 14:6; constr. praegn.´[[וְאֶל־מְקוֹמוֹ שׁ]]: Ec 1:5 unto his place he panteth (comes panting), of sun under fig. of racer.
gasp or pant with desire Ps 119:131 (‖[[יׇאַב ]]); pant after, be eager for, c. acc. Job 5:5 (cf. [[חַמִּים]] p. 855:b), Job 7:2 (‖[[יְקַוֶּה ]]), Job 36:20 (but obscure in context).
